column6: THE SECRET ARMOR WARS! - In a world without Iron Man, the Armor Wars are fought without a victor, scorching the Earth! - Years later, one of the last remaining superheroes, an aged Amazing Spider-Man, must form a Fantastic Four the likes of which our world has not seen in years! - Teaming with Ghost Rider, the Incredible Hulk and Wolverine they are in pursuit of the one weapon that could unite the planet - The Forgotten Iron Man!
